subject: For your attention.
body:
For your attention.
This is to officially inform you that African Union, set up an, Payment Adhoc Committee, in United States of America, to resolve and settle all outstanding Contract Inheritance Payment, from 2000 to 2023, which process was marred and halted by Fraud, Corruption, lack of Transparency and Deliberate attempt to deny legitimate Inheritors / Beneficiaries their entitlements (Funds).
African Union, was mandated by United Nation, to resolve issues of Contract Inheritance payment and other forms of payment emanating from Africa, to their beneficiaries, to redeem the image of Africa or risk having the concerned African Nations, sanctioned following letters of protests written to United Nation, IMF and World Bank, by deprived, defrauded and disgruntled African foreign Fund beneficiaries, within the period under review.
In view of the above, this Committee was set up in United States of America, as a liaison office, to scrutinize, identify beneficiaries, and work out modalities for payment to them, for transparency and for its integrity as the Committee, was mandated to ensure that all identified beneficiaries, are paid within two (2), working weeks.
Having identified you, as a beneficiary which, necessitated and prompted the Committee, to send this official notice to you, you are therefore, required to reconfirm the following details of your person:
Name--------
Nationality, State of Origin and Address ------------------
Telephone number, Age, Sex and Occupation ------
As listed above is the information required to complete the processing of your FILE as to refer you, immediately to the appointed Diplomatic Courier Company, to deliver the Ten Million Five Hundred Thousand USD ( US$10,500,000.00), approved and identified in your name to you, in physical cash as stamped with the approval codes in your name to avoid diversion and theft or through SWIFT WIRE TRANSFER to your nominated Bank Account from African Nations, Foreign Reserve Account with a United States, base Financial institution.
This is not a hoax, scam nor designed to mislead you given the ugly trend in the World, rather a genuine initiative by African Union, as directed by United Nations, IMF & World Bank, to ensure the release of Funds and prompt payment to all Contract Inheritance Beneficiaries and other Forms of Creditors, by African Governments, and Institutions therefore, respond accordingly and immediately to avoid skipping your payment FILE.
Kindly respond within 24hours of receiving this notice to make the job of the Committee easier.
For security reasons as to safeguard your details, send details as requested to the email address that appears if you click reply to.
Yours  truly,
Ide Stephen
Executive Secretary
AFRICAN UNION, UNITED STATES, PAYMENT ADHOC COMMITTEE 
Tel: +1(281)410-3941
Address:  10801 Hammerly Blvd, Houston, TX 77043, United States

subject: Re:   For your attention.
body:
Hello Ide Stephen,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite an interesting piece of information. The African Union's initiative sounds like a commendable effort to resolve issues related to contract payments and other forms of payment.

I'm curious about the process though. How does the committee identify individuals who are eligible for these payments? And how did my name come up in this context?

Also, could you please provide more details about the Diplomatic Courier Company that will be handling the delivery of funds? It would be great if you could share their credentials or any relevant information that can help me understand their role better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Stanley
